de.edu.game.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.edu.game.controller.GameController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/game")
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for most of the game logic

      • isMyTurn

        @GetMapping(value="/myturn")
public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> isMyTurn()
        Endpoint that checks if the user is on Turn
        Returns:
        Result with the Response of a String, if the user is on Turn.
        Or an Error message after an Timeout of 100.000 millSec

      • finishTurn

        @PutMapping(value="/endturn")
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
public void finishTurn()
                                                                         throws NotYourTurnException
        Endpoint for ending your Turn
        Throws:
        NotYourTurnException - If it was not your turn

      • move

        @PutMapping(value="/{meepleId}/{x}/{y}")
public void move(@PathVariable
                                                          int meepleId,
                                                          @PathVariable
                                                          int x,
                                                          @PathVariable
                                                          int y)
                                                   throws SpaceStationCannotMoveException,
                                                          HasAlreadyMovedException,
                                                          CannotMoveButIAttackException,
                                                          CannotMoveException,
                                                          StorageFullException,
                                                          CannotAttackOwnMeeplesException,
                                                          CannotMineException
        Endpoint for moving a @AbstractMeeple to an adjacent X / Y coordinate
        Parameters:
        meepleId - The id of the meeple, witch should move
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate
        Throws:
        SpaceStationCannotMoveException - If the meeple is an SpaceStation it cannot move
        HasAlreadyMovedException - If the meeple has already moved this round, it cannot move again
        CannotMoveButIAttackException - If the meeple (Starfighter) has attack an other meeple, but don't destroy it. It cannot move, and cannot move again this round
        CannotMoveException - The meeple cannot move to this point, but can move to another this round
        StorageFullException - The meeple (@Transporter) cannot mine more energy, because the storage is full
        CannotAttackOwnMeeplesException - The meeple (@Starfighter) cannot attack own meeples, but can move to an other field this round
        CannotMineException - The meeple (@Transporter) cannot mine here

      • buildStarfighter

        @PostMapping(value="/build/starfighter")
public void buildStarfighter()
                                                               throws NotEnoughEnergyException
        The SpaceStation build a new Starfighter
        Throws:
        NotEnoughEnergyException - If the SpaceStation has not enough energy to build a Starfighter

      • buildSTransporter

        @PostMapping(value="/build/transporter")
public void buildSTransporter()
                                                                throws NotEnoughEnergyException
        The SpaceStation build a new Transporter
        Throws:
        NotEnoughEnergyException - If the SpaceStation has not enough energy to build a Transporter
